= qutebrowser =

http://qutebrowser.org/

o:       Open new webpage in new tab
go:      Edit current URL
J:       Next tab
K:       Previous tab
ALT+<n>: Goto to tab n
d:       Close tab
u:       Undo close
H:       Back in history
L:       Forth in history
/:       Search in page, n/N to go back and forth between matches, Esc to stop


Commands:
:q              Quit
:wq             Save and quite
:adblock-update Download adblock lists and activate adblocking
:help           Help
